animeTitle: Esper Mami: Hoshizora no Dancing Doll
animeDescription: Schoolgirl Mami Sakura discovers that she has superpowers. She can sense other people in trouble and teleport to help them, but she keeps her secret double-life hidden from her parents with the help of her schoolfriend, Kazuo Takahata. In this short film, Mami uses her powers to make a puppet show for deprived children.   (Source: Anime Encyclopedia)
animeStaff: [['Urakami Yasuo', ['Sound Director']], ['Hashimoto Ushio', ['Theme Song Performance']], ['Mizushima Tsutomu', ['Production Assistant']], ['Saito Noriaki', ['In-Between Animation']]]
